article.headline: Western Kentucky 81, Montana 65
article.story: MISSOULA, Mont. (AP) -- Courtney Lee scored 25 points and grabbed 12 rebounds Wednesday to lead Western Kentucky to an 81-65 victory over Montana. Montana (3-5) was in the game until midway through the second half when the Hilltoppers (8-1) used a 22-5 run to break away from a 53-all tie. Led by the smooth-shooting Lee, Western Kentucky shot 56 percent from the field in the second half while limiting the Grizzlies to 33 percent. Andrew Strait, who matched Lee with 25 points and added 10 rebounds, hit eight of nine attempts from the field in the first half to help the Grizzlies a 27-15 lead with 8:25 left in the half. But the Hilltoppers rallied to tie the score at 27 on a basket by Matt Maresca with one second left in the half. In the second half, the teams traded leads seven times before Benson Callier put Western Kentucky up for good, 54-53, with a free throw at the 10:06 mark. Montana pulled within 75-62 on a free throw by Ryan Staudacher with 1:57 to play. But the Grizzlies couldn't come any closer and Western Kentucky rattled off six unanswered points to put the game away. Maresca added 16 points for Western Kentucky, followed by Tyrone Brazelton with 11. Cameron Rundles added 13 points for the Grizzlies. Montana's starting center, Jordan Hasquet, was held to two points and fouled out with nearly 13 minutes remaining.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
